snippet: Columbia defeated Wagner, 26-3, ending a 24-game losing streak. The Lions had not won Nov. 10, 2012.
abstract: College Football East Roundup; Columbia defeats Wagner, 26-3; other college football scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Columbia defeated Wagner, 26-3, ending a 24-game losing streak. The Lions had not won Nov. 10, 2012.

headline.print_headline: Rout Gives Columbia First Win in 3 Years
headline.main: Rout Gives Columbia First Win in 3 Years
